name: tutorconnect
description: A marketplace for private tutors and tuition centres in Singapore

scripts.dev: npm run cleanup && concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:users" "npm run dev:profiles" "npm run dev:bookings" "npm run dev:messaging" "npm run dev:reviews" "npm run dev:notifications" "npm run dev:analytics" "npm run dev:gamification" "npm run dev:earnings" "npm run dev:calendar" "npm run dev:maps" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:safe: npm run cleanup && npm run dev
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../services/auth && npm install && cd ../users && npm install && cd ../profiles && npm install && cd ../bookings && npm install && cd ../messaging && npm install && cd ../reviews && npm install && cd ../notifications && npm install && cd ../analytics && npm install && cd ../gamification && npm install && cd ../earnings && npm install && cd ../calendar && npm install && cd ../maps && npm install

author: TutorConnect Team
